PropertyDefinition.description: Number of the columns in the App Switcher
PropertyDefinition.name: NumberOfColumn

PropertyDefinition.description: Number of rows in the App Switcher
PropertyDefinition.name: NumberOfRow

PropertyDefinition.aspect.defaultValue:
This utility is used to add/remove tiles to/from the ThingWorx Console or App Switcher. Each row in the table represents a tile.

To add/update a tile

Specify the following fields
Order: specify an integer number (0 - 1000) to indicate the tile order; a tile with a smaller number will appear before a tile with a larger number.
Label: type a label if desirable.
Show in Console: check to show the tile in the ThingWorx Console.
Show in App Switcher: check to show the tile in the App Switcher.
Mashup or URL: specify a Thingworx Mashup or URL to open upon the tile is clicked.
Open in new window: check to open the mashup or URL in a new window.
Icon: specify a ThingWorx Media for the icon.
Background: specify a ThingWorx Media for the background.
Choose Add/Update

To delete a tile

Select a row
Choose Delete Tile

Note: to change the position of a tile, add a new one at the desired position and delete the existing one.
PropertyDefinition.name: Notes

ResultType.description: Number of missing tiles that were added.
ResultType.name: result

Notes.Value:
This utility is used to add/remove tiles to/from the ThingWorx Utilities Console or App Switcher. Each row in the table represents a tile.

To create a tile and add it to the table

Specify the following fields in the Console Tile panel
Order: specify an integer number (0 - 1000) to indicate the tile order; a tile with a smaller number will appear before a tile with a larger number.
Label: type a label if desirable.
Mashup or URL: specify a Thingworx Mashup or URL to open upon the tile is clicked.
Open in new window: check to open the mashup or URL in a new window.
Icon: specify a Thingworx Media for the icon. Use PTC.ConvergeConsole.Tile.Dummy.Icon if no icon is available or desirable.
Background: specify a Thingworx Media for the background.  Use PTC.ConvergeConsole.Tile.Dummy.Background if no background is available or desirable.
Tile Visibility: Optional (use with caution) comma delimited string of user groups to restrict the visibility of the tile.
Choose Create Tile

To delete a tile

Select a row
Choose Delete Tile from the toolbar

To modify a tile

Select a row
Change the corresponding fields
Choose Save Tile

To show a tile

Select a row
Check In Console to show the tile in the ThingWorx Utilities Console
Check In App Switcher to show the tile in the App Switcher
